name: Madrobot X (itch)
description:
MadRobot is a old school shoot 'em up game. You control a robot trying to escape from the laboratory of a mad scientist, for this you have the help of GoboGobo another robot wich also wants to escape.

The task is not easy the mad scientist will do everything to prevent anyone escape.

Features
- Pixel art style
- Tutorial
- Progressive challenge
- Power ups
- Special skills
- 12 Bosses
- Bullets, bullets, bullets!
- Mode Nightmare
- Game Type: Challenge
- Gameservices Scoreboard
- Gamepad support with 2 modes:
* Normal: LStick move robot, RStick shoot and maneuver the beam
* Classic: LSctick move robot and maneuver the beam, buttons shoot
- Gameplay adjustments(hitbox, touchscreen, hp recovery, etc..)
- Mute sound for music and sound effects
- And much more

Amazing new experience!



" MadRobot X is a polished oldschool inspired shooter where players must help just the head of a giant killer robot escape from the mad scientist's lab where it is being created by blasting away at an armada of automated security using a giant overpowered laser that has been smartly woven into the overall game design " - SupergameDroid

" MadRobot X is just a damn good game. I totally recommend " - Nardio.net

- Windows Self Installer.

- Controller and mouse support.

- Esc/Backspace to exit the game
